article.title: Fay Assigned to Headquarters U.S. Air Forces in Europe and Air Forces Africa

tags.tag: Headquarters U.S. Air Forces in Europe

article.text: Maj. Gen. Timothy G. Fay, USAF, has been assigned as director, Operations, Strategic Deterrence, and Nuclear Integration, Headquarters U.S. Air Forces in Europe and Air Forces Africa, Ramstein Air Base, Germany.
